p: Variation partitioning based on redundancy analyses was performed on Hellinger-transformed OTU abundances to identify the part of the variance explained by decay class, tree species or deadwood chemistry (pH, N, C, C/N and lignin) for the whole dataset and with decay class and deadwood chemistry for each tree species independently. The 'varpart' function from the 'vegan' R package was used [ 51]. The importance of the obtained variances was determined with Monte Carlo permutation tests.
